sections.heading: 01|Arrest, citation, and disposition alternatives definitions
sections.text: Effective:April 4, 2023Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 288 - 134th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in this chapter:(A) "Magistrate" has the same meaning as in section2931.01of the Revised Code.(B) "Peace officer" incl

sections.heading: 24, inclusive, of the Revised Code do not affect or modify the power of arrest vested by law in other persons or officers than those named in section2935
